Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: none
Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: No stroke. Used when no border is needed.

Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: xs
Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: Very thin stroke (1pt). Suitable for subtle outlines or hairlines.

Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: sm
Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: Thin stroke (2pt). Used for input fields or minimal borders.

Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: md
Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: Medium stroke (4pt). Used for prominent component outlines or highlights.

Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: lg
Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: Thick stroke (8pt). Used sparingly for high emphasis elements.

Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: defaultLignt
Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: The default set of stroke widths for light mode.

Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: defaultDark
Structs/ThemeStroke.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: The default set of stroke widths for dark mode.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: displayLarge
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Used for large promotional text or hero sections. Bold and eye-catching.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: displayMedium
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Slightly smaller than displayLarge, still used for prominent visual titles.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: displaySmall
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Smallest display style, typically used for titles or hero sections in constrained layouts.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: headlineLarge
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Large heading for pages or sections. Typically H1.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: headlineMedium
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Medium heading for sections or nested headers. Typically H2.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: headlineSmall
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Small heading for titles inside cards or components. Typically H3â€“H4.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: titleLarge
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Large title used for modals, sheets, or form sections.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: titleMedium
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Medium title for component headers and UI blocks.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: titleSmall
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Small title for inputs, lists, or compact titles.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: labelLarge
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Label for buttons, tabs, or labeled UI elements (e.g. filters).

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: labelMedium
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Smaller label text, used for secondary buttons, tags, etc.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: labelSmall
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Very small label for compact UI controls (e.g. chips, input fields).

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: bodyLarge
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Body text used in paragraphs and long-form content.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: bodyMedium
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Medium body text for standard blocks and list items.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: bodySmall
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Compact body text for footnotes, cards, and less prominent content.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: buttonText
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Text used inside buttons or CTA components.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: defaultLight
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Default typography scale using Jakarta font family.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.name: defaultDark
Structs/ThemeTypography.html#/s:13SwiftT.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: xs
Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Extra-small spacing. Used for tight gaps between small elements like icons or labels.

Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: sm
Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Small spacing. Typically used for padding inside buttons, cards, or input fields.

Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: md
Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Medium spacing. Ideal for spacing between grouped elements or sections.

Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: lg
Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Large spacing. Used for separating components or laying out screen-level spacing.

Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: xl
Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Extra-large spacing. Often used for outer padding or generous layout gaps.

Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: xxl
Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Double-extra-large spacing. Reserved for very large vertical spacing or whitespace-heavy layouts.

Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: defaultLight
Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Default spacing scale based on common design system sizes.

Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: defaultDark
Structs/ThemeSpacing.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Default spacing scale based on common design system sizes.

Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: xs
Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A shape style with 4 same-sized corners smaller than ThemeShapes.sm.

Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: sm
Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A shape style with 4 same-sized corners bigger than ThemeShapes.xs.

Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: md
Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A shape style with 4 same-sized corners bigger than ThemeShapes.sm.

Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: lg
Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A shape style with 4 same-sized corners bigger than ThemeShapes.md.

Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: xl
Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A shape style with 4 same-sized corners bigger than ThemeShapes.lg.

Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: copy(xs:sm:md:lg:xl:)
Structs/ThemeShapes.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: Returns a new ThemeShapes instance by copying the current one

Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: none
Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: No shadow. Used for flat surfaces and elements that should appear flush with the background.

Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: sm
Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Small shadow. Typically used for slightly elevated components like input fields or chips.

Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: md
Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Medium shadow. Suitable for cards, modals, and elevated surfaces.

Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: lg
Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Large shadow. Used for high-elevation components such as floating panels or bottom sheets.

Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: focus
Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Focus shadow. Applied to inputs or buttons when they are in a focused or active state.

Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: defaultLight
Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Default shadow set optimized for light mode. Uses dark shadow colors on light surfaces.

Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: defaultDark
Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Default shadow set optimized for dark mode. Uses subtle light shadows to maintain depth.

Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: copy(sm:md:lg:focus:none:)
Structs/ThemeShadows.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: Returns a new ThemeShadows instance by copying the current one

Structs/ThemeShadow.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: copy(color:radius:x:y:)
Structs/ThemeShadow.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: Returns a new ThemeShadow instance by copying the current one

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.name: none
Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: No corner radius (0pt). Used for completely square edges.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.name: xs
Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: Small corner radius (4pt). Used for subtle rounding on extra small elements or inputs.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.name: sm
Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: Small corner radius (4pt). Used for subtle rounding on small elements or inputs.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.name: md
Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: Medium corner radius (8pt). Used for buttons, cards, or modals with moderate rounding.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.name: lg
Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: Large corner radius (16pt). Ideal for highly rounded containers, cards, or UI highlights.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.name: xl
Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: Large corner radius (28pt). Ideal for highly rounded containers, cards, or UI highlights.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.name: pill
Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: Fully rounded edges (9999pt). Commonly used for pills, tags, badges, or chip components.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.name: defaultLight
Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: A predefined set of corner radius values for light mode.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.name: defaultDark
Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: A predefined set of corner radius values for dark mode.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html#/s:13SwiftThemeK.abstract: Initializes a custom set of radius tokens.

Structs/Card.html.name: Card
Structs/Card.html.abstract: A flexible, reusable card component that adapts to the current theme.

Structs/Checkbox.html.name: Checkbox
Structs/Checkbox.html.abstract: A custom themed checkbox component that adapts to the current Theme.

Structs/RadioButton.html.name: RadioButton
Structs/RadioButton.html.abstract: A customizable radio button component that conforms to the current Theme.

Structs/RadioGroup.html.name: RadioGroup
Structs/RadioGroup.html.abstract: A vertically stacked group of radio buttons bound to a single selection.

Structs/Theme.html.name: Theme
Structs/Theme.html.abstract: A complete representation of a visual theme including color, typography, spacing, radius, and shadow tokens.

Structs/ThemeRadii.html.name: ThemeRadii
Structs/ThemeRadii.html.abstract: Defines standard corner radius values used throughout the design system.

Structs/ThemeShadow.html.name: ThemeShadow
Structs/ThemeShadow.html.abstract: Defines a shadow style for UI elements, including color, blur radius, and offset values.

Structs/ThemeShadows.html.name: ThemeShadows
Structs/ThemeShadows.html.abstract: A collection of predefined shadow styles used to indicate elevation, depth, or focus across the UI.

Structs/ThemeSpacing.html.name: ThemeSpacing
Structs/ThemeSpacing.html.abstract: Defines the standard spacing scale for layout and padding/margin values throughout the app.

Structs/ThemeTypography.html.name: ThemeTypography
Structs/ThemeTypography.html.abstract: Defines a typography scale for use across an application, providing visual hierarchy and consistent font styling.

Structs/ThemedNavigationTitleModifier.ht.name: ThemedNavigationTitleModifier
Structs/ThemedNavigationTitleModifier.ht.abstract: A view modifier that sets a themed navigation title using your design system’s typography.

Structs/ThemeButtonStyle.html.name: ThemeButtonStyle
Structs/ThemeButtonStyle.html.abstract: A comprehensive button style that applies consistent theming across different button variants,

Structs/ThemeTextFieldStyle.html.name: ThemeTextFieldStyle
Structs/ThemeTextFieldStyle.html.abstract: A custom text field style that applies theming based on a Theme context.

Structs/ThemeProvider.html.name: ThemeProvider
Structs/ThemeProvider.html.abstract: A SwiftUI view that injects a visual theme (Theme) into the environment based on the system color scheme.

Structs/ThemeStroke.html.name: ThemeStroke
Structs/ThemeStroke.html.abstract: Defines the stroke widths used throughout the design system.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: applyThemeButtonStyle()
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a complete themed button style using values from the environment or theme defaults.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: buttonVariant(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Overrides the button variant (e.g., .filled, .outline, .text, etc.) for a single button.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: buttonSize(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Overrides the button size (e.g., .small, .medium, .large, .fullWidth) for a single button.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: buttonShape(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Overrides the button shape (e.g., .capsule, .rounded, .rectangle) for a single button.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: plainTextButton(_:weight:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a text-only button style with no padding or background.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: buttonLabelStyle(_:weight:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a specific font style to the button’s label without affecting other styling.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: applyThemeTextFieldStyle()
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies the theme’s default text field style and propagates environment configuration

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: textFieldVariant(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Sets the visual variant of the text field (e.g., .filled, .outlined, .underlined).

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: textFieldSize(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Sets the sizing token for the text field (e.g., .small, .medium, .large).

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: textFieldShape(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Sets the corner shape of the text field (e.g., .rounded, .square, .capsule).

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: isError(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Marks the text field as being in an error state, typically changing the border color.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: textFieldFont(_:weight:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a specific font style from the theme typography to the text field.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: shadow(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a shadow to the view using a predefined ShadowToken from the current theme.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: font(_:weight:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a font style from the current theme using a TextStyleToken.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: foregroundColor(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a foreground text or icon color using a theme-defined ColorToken.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: backgroundColor(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a background fill color using a theme-defined ColorToken.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: backgroundColor(_:edgesIgnoringSafeArea:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a background fill color using a theme-defined ColorToken.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: padding(_:_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies padding using a SpacingToken from the theme and optional edge set.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: cornerRadius(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a corner radius using a RadiusToken from the current theme.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: clipRadius(_:style:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Clips the view using a RoundedRectangle shape with radius defined by a RadiusToken.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: stroke(_:radius:color:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a themed stroke (border) to the current view.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: clipShape(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies a theme shape to the current view

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: navigationTitle(_:style:weight:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Sets a custom navigation title using the theme’s typography system.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.name: if(_:transform:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP0A.abstract: Applies the given transform if the given condition evaluates to true.

Enums/TextFieldVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTh.name: outlined
Enums/TextFieldVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTh.abstract: An outlined text field with a border around its shape.

Enums/TextFieldVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTh.name: underlined
Enums/TextFieldVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTh.abstract: A text field with an underline rather than a full border.

Enums/TextFieldVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTh.name: filled
Enums/TextFieldVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTh.abstract: A filled text field with a background color and no border.

Enums/TextFieldVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTh.name: plain
Enums/TextFieldVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTh.abstract: A plain text field without additional styling.

Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: small
Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A compact text field with smaller padding and font.

Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: medium
Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: The default size for standard input fields.

Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: large
Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A large input field typically used in prominent UI sections.

Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: padding(theme:)
Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: Returns the padding to apply based on the theme’s spacing tokens.

Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: font(theme:)
Enums/TextFieldSize.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: Returns the corresponding font from the theme based on field size.

Enums/TextFieldShape.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: square
Enums/TextFieldShape.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: A square button with no corner radius.

Enums/TextFieldShape.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: rounded
Enums/TextFieldShape.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: A rounded text field using the theme’s medium radius (ThemeRadii.md).

Enums/TextFieldShape.html#/s:13SwiftThem.name: capsule
Enums/TextFieldShape.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: A capsule-shaped text field with fully rounded corners (uses ThemeRadii.pill).

Enums/TextFieldShape.html#/s:13SwiftThem.abstract: A custom shape with a specific corner radius.

Enums/CheckboxShape.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: square

Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: filled
Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A solid-filled button. Most prominent and commonly used for primary actions.

Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: tonal
Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A tonal button with background color and no elevation or border.

Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: outline
Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A button with an outlined border and no background fill.

Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: elevated
Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A lightly elevated button with a subtle background and shadow.

Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: text
Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: A minimal button with no background, border, or elevation.

Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.name: borderColor(for:role:)
Enums/ButtonVariant.html#/s:13SwiftTheme.abstract: Determines the border color to apply based on the variant and button role.

Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.name: small
Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.abstract: Small button size. Compact padding and a small font.

Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.name: medium
Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.abstract: Medium button size. Moderate padding and a larger label font.

Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.name: large
Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.abstract: Large button size. Generous padding and body-level typography.

Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.name: fullWidth
Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.abstract: Full-width button. Stretches to fill horizontal space.

Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.name: custom(_:_:)
Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.abstract: A custom button size, allowing full control over both padding and font.

Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.name: paddingValues(for:)
Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.abstract: Computes the edge insets (padding) to apply for the given button size.

Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.name: font(for:)
Enums/ButtonSize.html#/s:13SwiftThemeKit.abstract: Resolves the appropriate font to use based on button size.

Enums/ButtonShape.html.name: ButtonShape
Enums/ButtonShape.html.abstract: Represents the visual shape of a button used in themed UI components.

Enums/ButtonSize.html.name: ButtonSize
Enums/ButtonSize.html.abstract: Defines the size and layout configuration for themed buttons.

Enums/ButtonVariant.html.name: ButtonVariant
Enums/ButtonVariant.html.abstract: Defines the visual style variants available for themed buttons.

Enums/CheckboxShape.html.name: CheckboxShape
Enums/CheckboxShape.html.abstract: Represents the visual shape of a button used in themed UI components.

Enums/TextFieldShape.html.name: TextFieldShape
Enums/TextFieldShape.html.abstract: Represents the visual shape of a text field used in themed UI components.

Enums/TextFieldSize.html.name: TextFieldSize
Enums/TextFieldSize.html.abstract: Represents the size of a text field, affecting both padding and font.

Enums/TextFieldVariant.html.name: TextFieldVariant
Enums/TextFieldVariant.html.abstract: Defines the visual style or variant of a text field.

Enums/StrokeToken.html.name: StrokeToken
Enums/StrokeToken.html.abstract: Stroke tokens for standardized access to stroke widths.
